title: Deep Blue
author: Reinhard
hint: You must sacrifice one gem.

title: Level 42
author: Jürgen
map: #Q........QQ. B Y B G0R Y G R  B  Q...*..#

title: Three Choices
author: Reinhard
hint: If you go left, you lose your horse. If you go right, you lose your soul. If you go straight, you die.

title: Strip Mining
author: Ronald
hint: This level contains just one bomb. Use it with caution.

title: Sinking Isle of Treasure
author: Ronald
hint: Apply your time bombs at the right places and the whole treasure will collect at the bottom.

title: Great Dropping
author: Ronald
hint: Acid rain.

title: Hard Work II
author: Ronald
map: # Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   Q   0   #

title: Crawalla
author: Ronald
hint: Try to ride on the wings of the storm.
map: #*Q.QQQQQQQ##Q#QQ.# G B Y R G B Y ####Q#

title: Boulder Problem
author: Ronald
hint: It seems to be a problem to get all the boulders to fall through the converter. Just work with one boulder at a time.

title: Magic Forrest
author: Ronald
hint: This forrest really grows very quickly.

title: Disruptor
author: Ronald
hint: Just clean up the level completely and collect everything inside.

title: Many Rooms
author: Ronald
map: #E.      Y0.0 .0Y .0..00*Y   *   Y 0#B R R R R R R+.0.  G G G  #

title: Acrobatica II
author: Jürgen
hint: into this one...

title: Pea Soup
author: Ronald
hint: ... with carrots. Try to get 96 peas out of the soup, wasting not more than two.

title: Rainbow II
author: Jürgen, Ronald
hint: Nearly the same level as 'Rainbow', but now waste not more than 6 sapphires.

title: Leo IV
author: Leo de Bruin.
hint: The most difficult thing to do here is to kill the YamYam-beast at the correct spot.

title: Converter
author: Ronald
hint: As the gems you have are not sufficient to solve the game, you have to increase their value.

title: Lorries in a Box II
author: Alexander
hint: Time to sacrifice some gems.

title: Ice Cube
author: Alexander
hint: You have to get only 22 sapphires out of the cube.

title: Overroll
author: Alexander
hint: This looks somehow like a 'Mission Possible'. But you have no bombs to bridge the gap for the stone.

title: Electric Fence
author: Alexander
hint: Hide!

title: Evaporating Bridge
author: Alexander
hint: This one works a little like Matrix but now it's for a bridge. Don't wait too long between safes!

title: YamYam Party
author: Alexander
hint: Get to the cake before there is none left.

title: Stripes
author: Alexander, Reinhard
hint: A nice stripe pattern waits to be collected.

title: Rock Review
author: Alexander
hint: (almost) All your favorites!

title: Bio Recycling
author: Alexander
hint: This is an Emerald Mine level sequel. No free gems.

title: Dark Room
author: Alexander
hint: A lot of evasive action is necessary here.

title: Fallin' Laser
author: Alexander
hint: Here you have to shoot the lasers from a falling ruby.

title: Little Hurry
author: Alexander
hint: The difficulty here is the limited time.

title: Rooms and More Rooms
author: Alexander
hint: Complete the rooms and move on...but be sure to get all you need first.

title: Big Present III
author: Ronald, Jürgen, Reinhard
hint: Then take this:

title: Sinking Isle of Treasure II
author: Ronald
hint: A long way my friend. This demo has been created at 3 o'clock in the morning.

title: Evaporating Bridge
author: Alexander
hint: This one works a little like Matrix but now it's for a bridge. Don't wait too long between safes!

title: YamYam Party
author: Alexander
hint: Get to the cake before there is none left.

title: Stripes
author: Alexander, Reinhard
hint: A nice stripe pattern waits to be collected.

title: Rock Review
author: Alexander
hint: (almost) All your favorites!

title: Bio Recycling
author: Alexander
hint: This is an Emerald Mine level sequel. No free gems.

title: Dark Room
author: Alexander
hint: A lot of evasive action is necessary here.

title: Fallin' Laser
author: Alexander
hint: Here you have to shoot the lasers from a falling ruby.

title: Little Hurry
author: Alexander
hint: The difficulty here is the limited time.

title: Rooms and More Rooms
author: Alexander
hint: Complete the rooms and move on...but be sure to get all you need first.

title: Big Present III
author: Ronald, Jürgen, Reinhard
hint: Then take this:

title: Sinking Isle of Treasure II
author: Ronald
hint: A long way my friend. This demo has been created at 3 o'clock in the morning.

title: Basic Mining
author: Reinhard
hint: A simple mine to learn how to control the miner. Use the directional keys to move or draw the path on a touch display. Move over gems to collect them.

title: Pushing the Stone
author: Reinhard
hint: Objects that can not be collected can often be pushed aside. Make sure the space behind the rock is empty and then move the miner against the rock.

title: Sapphires Preferred
author: Reinhard
hint: For the amount of gems to collect, every sapphire is worth two emeralds. So if you have to choose between them, take the sapphire.

title: Collect by Grabbing
author: Reinhard
hint: To collect a nearby object without actually moving there, press the Ctrl/Action key before or while using a directional key. On touch displays simply tap on the object.

title: Welcome to the Game
author: Reinhard
hint: As you may have noticed, many objects tend to fall down when not properly supported. Be careful to not get smashed.

title: Open the Bag
author: Reinhard
hint: Bags open up when they are hit by a rock.

title: Rocks Smash Sapphires
author: Reinhard
hint: Sapphire are not as robust as emeralds in this game and will be crushed when hit by a rock. Don't worry, in this level this is intended.

title: Valuable and Delicate
author: Reinhard
hint: Citrines are the most fragile gems in the game and will be smashed when hit by any object and even if hitting the ground themselves.

title: Adventure in a Bag
author: Reinhard
hint: There are 5 bags, but only one rock to drop on them. Probably you need to arrange the bags in a certain way.

title: Small Vault
author: Reinhard
hint: Cautious handling of the fragile gems will not be enough for this level. There is also a time where swiftness of action is essential.

title: How Bombs Work
author: Reinhard
hint: Handle explosives with caution. Dropping bombs or dropping anything on them will blast anything in a 3x3 area.

title: Extract the Emerald
author: Reinhard
hint: Not everything is completely destroyed in an explosion. Some items will be just blasted free of their confinement.

title: Dynamite
author: Reinhard
hint: Packs of dynamite can be collected and placed at a different position. Press the Shift/Action2 key where you want to plant an explosion or tap the dynamite symbol in the status bar on a touch display.

title: Open Safes with Bombs
author: Reinhard
hint: Blasting open a safe reveals the bag that is inside. Once you have this, open the bag as usual.

title: A Box Full of Dynamite
author: Reinhard
hint: Dynamite sometimes comes in boxes with 10 packs each. This should be sufficient to clear this level.

title: Safes can be Moved
author: Reinhard
hint: Like other square objects in this game, safes actually defy gravity and can be pushed around in any direction.

title: Chain Reaction
author: Reinhard
hint: Explosives are not only triggered by impact but of course also by previous explosions.

title: Highly Explosive
author: Reinhard
hint: Solid walls normally withstand the blast of an explosion. Not so if a whole box of dynamite is involved.

title: Acid
author: Reinhard
hint: This acid instantly dissolves anything that happens to fall in. Gems are no exception.

title: Königsberg
author: Reinhard
hint: This is an old mathematical problem: Can you walk through Königsberg and use every bridge exactly once?

title: Sokoban?
author: Reinhard
hint: Just an homage to another computer game classic.

title: Neighbours
author: Ronald
hint: Visit your neighbours two times each.

title: Two Miners
author: Reinhard
hint: Use the 'enter' key or the third action key to switch between miners. Simultaneous movement is possible by using D,G,R,G keys or extra keypad.

title: Double Helix
author: Erik
hint: Find your ways through this twisted tunnel (using some involuntary help from the inhabitants).

title: Infinity
author: Erik
hint: I'm sure you can solve this level in less than infinite time.
map: # R G E            #2Y1#            E R G #

title: Em'ralds a lot
author: Alexander
hint: Collect or hide?

title: Camillo Sitte
author: Erik
hint: Have a wonderful day in the city. You just have to see every street and every place!

title: Two are Busy
author: Erik
hint: The hourglass will not turn around.

title: Pipemania
author: Erik
hint: First build a pipe, then let the swamp flow through it.
